##Basic statistics

```{r}
descriptive_stats(lipidomics)
```

##Figure outputs

```{r}
ggplot(lipidomics, aes(x = value)) +
    geom_histogram() +
    facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free") #split histogram based on metabolites
```

```{r}
#' Title
#'
#' @param data 
#'
#' @return “A plot object.”

plot_distributions <- function(data) {
  data %>% 
        ggplot2::ggplot(data, aes(x = value)) +
    ggplot2::geom_histogram() +
    ggplot2::facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")
}
```
